title: Sweeteners (in addition to list of ingredients requirements)

rules.text: is aspartame added to the prepackaged food?
path: Sweeteners (in addition to list of ingredients requirements)

rules.text: if so, is a phenylalanine statement present?
path: Sweeteners (in addition to list of ingredients requirements)

rules.text: does the statement appear at the end of the list of ingredients?
path: Sweeteners (in addition to list of ingredients requirements)

rules.text: is the statement in bold type?
path: Sweeteners (in addition to list of ingredients requirements)

rules.text: is the product a table-top sweetener?
path: Sweeteners (in addition to list of ingredients requirements)

rules.text: if so and aspartame, sucralose, acesulfame-potassium or neotame are present, is a statement of the sweetness per serving expressed in terms of the amount of sugar required to produce an equivalent degree of sweetness declared on the label, grouped with the list of ingredients?
path: Sweeteners (in addition to list of ingredients requirements)
Sweeteners (in addition to list of ingredients requirements)
